The movie follows the story of a game designer who must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged. The movie features plenty of funny moments and an great soundtrack.

I hope you enjoy these two action game movies: "The Rugrats Movie" (1998) and "eXistenZ" (1999).

Based on your preferences and the genre you've specified, I would like to suggest "Three Kings" (1999) as a potential recommendation.
The movie is an award-winning documentary that tells the story of three triathletes from the same small town training for the triathlon World Championships.
One of the athletes, Bill Chaffey, was training for his first Olympic distance triathlon when he was involved in a horrendous accident that left him a paraplegic. For four years he trained himself in the disciplines of wheelchair and hand cycle racing to complete his dream of completing a triathlon and representing Australia in a World event while remaining just one of the boys.
The movie is an award-winning documentary that tells the story of three triathletes from the same small town training for the triathlon World Championships.
